menu.inventorypause.settings.title: Inventory Pause Config
menu.inventorypause.settings.mod_compat_: Configure mod compat options, e.g. the identifiers of the modded inventories to pause
menu.inventorypause.settings.enabled.too: When set to off temporarily disables all features the mod provides. THIS SETTING IS TEMPORARY AND WILL RESET THE NEXT TIME YOU START THE GAME
menu.inventorypause.settings.pauseSounds: Turn this on if you want sounds like music etc. to stop
menu.inventorypause.settings.disableSavi: Disable this if you experience lag spikes when quickly opening and closing inventories
menu.inventorypause.settings.modCompat.c: Screens listed below will be paused
menu.inventorypause.settings.modCompat.t: For the screens listed below the tick rate will be set to %s making the game %s%% slower than normal.
menu.inventorypause.settings.modCompat.c: Some mod GUIs may not work correctly without any in-game time passing. For any screens listed here time will still pass albeit slowed down. The speed can be adjusted above
menu.inventorypause.settings.modCompat.e: Target can't be found / is invalid
Target is not supported / not a screen
menu.inventorypause.settings.modCompat.r: Resets the time between compat ticks to the default value (20 ticks)
menu.inventorypause.settings.modCompat.d: Debug Mode adds a overlay displaying the class name of the currently displayed menu and its parent classes
menu.inventorypause.pauseGameAnywhere.ti: Game paused. Press ESC to unpause.
chat.inventorypause.addToList.action: Inventory Pause: Added current screen to the list of custom paused screens
chat.inventorypause.addToList.error.dupl: Inventory Pause: Current screen is already in the the list of custom paused screens
chat.inventorypause.addToList.error.alre: Inventory Pause: Current screen is already covered by the config. To add this screen first disable that config option.
chat.inventorypause.addToList.error.paus: Inventory Pause: Current screen is already pausing the game
menu.inventorypause.settings.confirmatio: Do you want to keep them?
